name: !game
description: Displays the current game being played

name: !discord
description: Displays a link to Otto's Discord server

name: !bttv
description: Displays info for viewers to get the bttv emotes

name: !love
description: Tell Otto you love him!

name: !rage
description: Displays the amount of times otto has rage quit

name: !hug
description: Give the target viewer a hug!

name: !lurk
description: Announce the desire to lurk

name: !mind
description: Tells Otto to calm down, and not think so much about it

name: !subhype
description: For use when someone subs, to let them know we love them

name: !uptime
description: Display stream uptime

name: !followage
description: Displays the amount of days you've been following

name: !watchtime
description: Displays the amount of hours you've watched the stream

name: !onlyfans
description: Displays a link to Otto's coveted Onlyfans (j/k)

name: !ottobots
description: The ottobot cheer

name: !fingerguns
description: (☞ﾟヮﾟ)☞

name: !tableunflip
description: ┬─┬ノ( º _ ºノ)

name: !lick
description: Lick the target viewer

name: !tickle
description: Tickle the target viewer

name: !tangled
description: A constant reminder that Otto needs to watch Tangled

name: !stretch
description: A reminder for Otto to take a break to stretch his back

name: !cg
description: Posts a link to Otto's Chat Guesser

name: !bed
description: Wish whomever stated they were going to bed a good night

name: !ban
description: Bans the target viewer (not really)

name: !stream
description: Remind everyone that the stream belongs to the people

name: !schedule
description: Displays Otto's schedule

name: !followers
description: Displays the current number of followers

name: !subs
description: Displays the current number of subscribers

name: !burn
description: For use when someone lays down a sick burn

name: !cheers
description: Cheers!

name: !meds
description: A reminder for everyone to take their meds

name: !stab
description: Stab the target viewer (which isn't very nice)

name: !fart
description: Fart noise || fart in a viewer's general direction

name: !cult
description: The 'cult' disclaimer

name: !ottoboy
description: Let Otto know he's just our little ottoboy

name: !waitwhat
description: Displays the amount of times Otto has said, 'Wait, what?'

name: !waitwhat+
description: Increments the !waitwhat counter

name: !quote
description: Display a random quote || display a quote by its number

name: !heist
description: Start/join a heist to get points!

name: !gamble
description: Gamble to get points!

name: !give
description: Give points to the target viewer

name: !points
description: Display how many points you have

name: !top
description: Display the top viewers based on points

name: !tophours
description: Display the top viewers based on hours watched

name: !8ball
description: Ask the 8ball a question and receive a non-commital answer

name: !slots
description: Try your luck at the slots for more points!

name: !duel
description: Request to duel another viewer for points

name: !accept
description: Accept a duel challenge from another viewer

name: !deny
description: Deny a duel challenge form another viewer

name: !cancel
description: Cancel a duel you have initiated

name: !death
description: Display current number of deaths on the death counter
